forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 65F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain late. Low 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 65F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low near 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 68F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
